Package lighthouse

package lighthouse
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    lighthouse.util
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Lighthouse
    Lighthouse.java is the entry point to the information retrieval engine.
    QueryEngine
    The QueryEngine class is used to calculate weights for each of the tokens, along with initialization of efficient data structure for use when user begins making queries.
    Tokenizer
    The Tokenizer class reads in all files contained in the corpus' designated file location and tokenizes the contents, along with calculating counts for each of the tokens
